entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
